org.gvsig.raster.beans.canvas.layers.functions
Class BaseFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.raster.beans.canvas.DrawableElement
      org.gvsig.raster.beans.canvas.layers.functions.BaseFunction
Direct Known Subclasses:
StraightLine
public abstract class BaseFunction
extends DrawableElement

Todo algoritmo que queramos que implemente un realce, debe heredar de esta base para poder distinguir los drawables genericos de los algoritmos.

Version:
03/03/2008
Author:
BorSanZa - Borja Sánchez Zamorano (borja.sanchez@iver.es)
